Verses: 1 karththar Naaththaanai Dhaaveedhinidaththil Anuppinaar; Ivan Avanidaththil Vandhu, Avanai Nokki: Oru Pattanaththil Irandu Manushar Irundhaargal; Oruvan Aisuvariyavaan, Matravan Dhariththiran.
2 aisuvariyavaanukku Aadumaadugal Vegu Thiralaayirundhadhu.

3 dhariththiranukko Thaan Kondu Valarththa Ore Oru Sinna Aattukkuttiyaiththavira Verondrum Illaadhirundhadhu; Adhu Avanodum Avan Pillaigalodunkooda Irundhu Valarndhu, Avan Vaayin Appaththaith Thindru, Avan Paaththiraththile Kudiththu, Avan Madiyile Paduththukkondu, Avanukku Oru Magalaippola Irundhadhu.

4 andha Aisuvariyavaanidaththil Vazhippokkan Oruvan Vandhaan; Avan Thannidaththil Vandha Vazhippokkanukku Samaiyal Pannuvikka, Thannudaiya Aadumaadugalil Ondraip Pidikka Manadhillaamal, Andha Dhariththiranudaiya Aattukkuttiyaip Pidiththu, Adhaith Thannidaththil Vandha Manushanukku Samaiyalpannuviththaan Endraan.

5 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu: Andha Manushanmel Migavum Kobamoondavanaagi, Naaththaanaip Paarththu: Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydha Manushan Maranaththirkuppaaththiran Endru Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren.
6 avan Irakkamatravanaayirundhu, Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydhapadiyinaal, Andha Aattukkuttikkaaga Naalaththanai Thirumba Seluththavendum Endraan.

7 appozhudhu Naaththaan Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Neeye Andha Manushan; Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu, Ennavendraal, Naan Unnai Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanni, Unnai Savulin Kaikkuth Thappuviththu,

8 un Aandavanudaiya Veettai Unakkuk Koduththu, Un Aandavanudaiya Sthreegalaiyum Un Madiyile Thandhu, Isravel Vamsaththaiyum, Yoodhaa Vamsaththaiyum Unakkuk Kaiyaliththen; Idhu Podhaadhirundhaal, Innum Unakku Vendiyadhaith Tharuven.

9 karththarudaiya Paarvaikkup Pollaappaana Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydhu, Avarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Nee Asattai Panninadhu Enna? Eththiyanaagiya Uriyaavai Nee Pattayaththaal Madiviththu, Avan Manaiviyai Unakku Manaiviyaaga Eduththukkondu, Avanai Ammon Puththirarin Pattayaththaale Kondrupottaai.
10 ippodhum Nee Ennai Asattaipanni, Eththiyanaagiya Uriyaavin Manaiviyai Unakku Manaiviyaaga Eduththukkondapadiyinaal, Pattayam Endraikkum Un Veettaivittu Vilagaadhirukkum.

11 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Naan Un Veettile Pollaappai Unmel Ezhumbappanni, Un Kangal Paarkka, Un Sthreegalai Eduththu, Unakku Aduththavanukkuk Koduppen; Avan Indha Sooriyanudaiya Velichchaththile Un Sthreegalode Sayanippaan.
12 nee Olippidaththil Adhai Seydhaai; Naano Indhak Kaariyaththai Isravelar Ellaarukku Munbaagavum, Sooriyanukku Munbaagavum Seyvippen Endraar Endru Sonnaan.
13 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Naaththaanidaththil: Naan Karththarukku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhen Endraan. Naaththaan Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Nee Saagaadhapadikku, Karththar Un Paavam Neengachcheydhaar.

14 aanaalum Indhak Kaariyaththinaale Karththarudaiya Saththurukkal Dhooshikka Nee Kaaranamaayirundhapadiyinaal, Unakkup Pirandha Pillai Nichchayamaai Saagum Endru Solli, Naaththaan Than Veettukkuppoivittaan.
15 appozhudhu Karththar Uriyaavin Manaivi Dhaaveedhukkup Petra Aanpillaiyai Adiththaar; Adhu Vyaadhippattuk Kevalamaayirundhadhu.
16 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Andhap Pillaikkaaga Dhevanidaththil Praarththanaipanni, Ubavaasiththu, Ullepoi, Raamuzhudhum Tharaiyile Kidandhaan.
17 avanaith Tharaiyilirundhu Ezhundhirukkappanna, Avan Veettilulla Moopparaanavargal Ezhundhu, Avanandaiyil Vandhaalum, Avan Maatten Endru Solli, Avargalode Appam Saappidaamal Irundhaan.

18 ezhaamnaalil, Pillai Seththuppoyitru. Pillai Seththuppoyitru Endru Dhaaveedhin Oozhiyakkaarar Avanukku Arivikka Aiyappattaargal; Pillai Uyirodirukkaiyil, Naam Avarode Pesugirapodhu, Avar Nammudaiya Sorketkavillai; Pillai Seththuppoyitru Endru Avarode Eppadi Solluvom? Adhigamaaga Vyaagulappaduvaare Endru Pesikkondaargal.

19 dhaaveedhu Than Oozhiyakkaarar Ragasiyamaaip Pesikkollugiradhaikkandu, Pillai Seththuppoyitru Endru Arindhu, Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Pillai Seththuppoyitro Endru Kettaan; Seththuppoyitru Endraargal.

20 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Tharaiyaivittu Ezhundhu, Snaanampanni, Enneypoosikkondu, Than Vasthirangalaimaatri, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Pravesiththu, Panindhukondu, Than Veettukkuvandhu, Bojanam Kettaan; Avanmunne Adhai Vaiththapodhu Pusiththaan.

21 appozhudhu Avan Oozhiyakkaarar Avanai Nokki: Neer Seygira Indhak Kaariyam Enna? Pillai Uyirodirukkaiyil Ubavaasiththu Azhudheer; Pillai Mariththapinbu, Ezhundhirundhu Asanampannugireere Endraargal.
22 adharku Avan: Pillai Innum Uyirodirukkaiyil, Pillai Pizhaikkumpadikkuk Karththar Enakku Iranguvaaro, Eppadiyo, Yaarukkuth Theriyum Endru Ubavaasiththu Azhudhen.

23 adhu Mariththirukkira Ippodhu Naan Ubavaasikkavendiyadhu Enna? Ini Naan Adhaith Thirumbivarappannakkoodumo? Naan Adhinidaththukkup Povene Allaamal, Adhu Ennidaththukkuth Thirumbi Varappogiradhu Illai Endraan.

24 pinbu Dhaaveedhu Than Manaiviyaagiya Padhsebaalukku Aarudhal Solli, Avalidaththil Poi, Avalode Sayaniththaan; Aval Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal; Avanukku Saalomon Endru Perittaan; Avanidaththil Karththar Anbaayirundhaar.
25 avar Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Naaththaanai Anuppa, Avan Karththarin Nimiththam Avanukku Yedhidhiyaa Endru Perittaan.
26 adharkulle Yovaab Ammon Puththirarudaiya Rappaa Pattanaththinmel Yuththampanni, Raajadhaaniyaip Pidiththu,
27 dhaaveedhinidaththil Aal Anuppi, Naan Rappaavinmel Yuththampanni, Thanneer Oramaana Pattanaththaip Pidiththukkonden.
28 naan Pattanaththaip Pidikkiradhinaal, En Per Vazhangaadhapadikku, Neer Matra Janangalaik Koottikkonduvandhu, Pattanaththai Mutrikkaipottu, Pidikkavendum Endru Solla Sonnaan.
29 appadiye Dhaaveedhu Janangalaiyellaam Koottikkondu, Rappaavukkuppoi, Adhinmel Yuththampanni, Adhaip Pidiththaan.

30 avargaludaiya Raajaavin Thalaimelirundha Kreedaththai Eduththukkondaan; Adhu Oru Thaalandhu Niraiponnum, Raththinangal Padhiththadhumaayirundhadhu; Adhu Dhaaveedhinudaiya Thalaiyil Vaikkappattadhu; Pattanaththilirundhu Eraalamaana Kollaiyaik Konduponaan.

31 pinbu Adhilirundha Janangalai Avan Veliye Kondupoi Avargalai Vaalgalukkum, Iruppup Paaraigalukkum, Iruppuk Kodarigalukkum Utpaduththi, Avargalai Sengarchoolaiyaiyum Kadakkappanninaan; Ippadi Ammon Puththirarin Pattanangalukkellaam Seydhu, Dhaaveedhu Ellaa Janaththodunkooda Erusalemukkuth Thirumbinaan.
